name: Chop Your Own Wood Winter Decor
description:
My husband said this the other day as he was bringing in some firewood, and something about it just warmed my soul. 

I believe the quote is originally from Henry Ford, and says wood instead of firewood, but I love it just the same. I picture this piece being hung along with your winter decor, or propped up on your fireplace mantel. 

The sign measures 16x20 inches, and is made of burlap hand wrapped around a sturdy canvas frame. It comes ready to hang. The writing is all hand lettered and hand painted, making this one of a kind!

name: Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas
description:
Tis the season!

Celebrate with this lovely sign that reads "Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas."

The sign is hand painted in red and white paint. It is made of burlap hand wrapped around a sturdy wood frame with a strong canvas backing.

It measures 24x12 inches, and is approximately .75 inches thick.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions. Thank you so much!

name: Holly Jolly Christmas Sign
description:
Get yourself a big dose of holiday cheer this season with this fun Holly Jolly sign.

The sign is hand lettered and painted onto an 11x14 inch burlap wrapped canvas. 

It comes ready to hang, but looks just as good propped up on your holiday mantle. Please feel free to ask if you have any other questions!

name: Mini State Art Blocks- Pick Your State
description:
These tiny state art blocks make an adorable addition to any decor.

They measure 4x4x1.5 inches and are comprised of burlap wrapped around a sturdy wood frame and backed in canvas for extra durability. They come ready to hang but are sturdy enough to stand on their own on a shelf or mantle, as well.

The state of your choice is hand painted onto each block- making each one unique. The block will come with black paint unless you specify otherwise in the notes to seller box during checkout. Your color possibilities are endless!

I also love custom orders- so please let me know if you've got another idea. I would love to work with you. Feel free to ask any other questions and have a lovely day!

name: Oklahoma Sign- Buffalo Bill Quote on Burlap: Life on the Plains, 36x24 inches
description:
This incredible Oklahoma sign is a treasure to be had.

A black outline of the state of Oklahoma houses a quote by Buffalo Bill: "I was persuaded now that I was destined to lead a life on the plains."

The black paint has a slightly distressed look, providing a rustic feel with tiny spots of burlap peeking through here and there.

The art is hand painted on tightly woven burlap wrapped around a sturdy wood frame, and reinforced with a durable canvas backing. The piece measures 36x24 inches, and is ready to hang or sit propped up on a shelf or mantle.

Show your Oklahoma state pride, and hang this burlap sign in your home or office today!

NOTE: Shipping costs vary wildly between zip codes with a package this size. I am happy to refund any overages in my shipping estimate once your order has been placed. Thank you!

name: Recycled Burlap Coffee Bag Sign, 16x20
description:
I've recently come across some recycled burlap coffee bags, and I am in love. The feel, the faded colors, the smell- all of it just makes me want to sit back and enjoy a cup of joe.

This burlap coffee sack has been tightly wrapped around a 20x16 inch sturdy wood frame. The back side has been reinforced with canvas and an extra layer of natural burlap to really make the colors of the coffee sack pop and reduce light coming in through the weave.

The text and image are slightly off center, just as they were on the coffee bag itself. Some areas on the logo are more faded and worn than others- evidence of a trip across the world to bring delicious coffee beans to a shop near you.

This burlap sign comes ready to hang, and would look awesome in a kitchen, reading nook, or even a coffee shop!

Please let me know if you have any other questions or requests. I love custom orders!

Thank you for browsing and have a wonderful day!

name: Mustache Art Block
description:
This sweet little mustache block can add just the right level of quirkiness to any display.

The block measures 4x4x1.5 inches, and is made of burlap wrapped around a sturdy wood frame with a canvas backing. The block can be hung, but it looks just as cute sitting up on a shelf on its own. 

Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions. Thank you!

name: Antler Art Block
description:
Now the popular antler silhouette is available as a mini!

This tiny art block packs a lot of punch. Antlers are painted in black on a 4x4x1.5 inch burlap wrapped wooden frame. Ladies, this is how you can bring your man's love of hunting into your home in the most adorable way possible!

These little masterpieces come ready to hang, but are fully capable of standing on their own. This makes them perfect for gallery walls or bookshelves alike.

name: Mustache Sign
description:
How fun is this giant mustache sign?

Measurements are 24 inches across by 12 inches high. The sign comes ready to hang but looks just as cute propped up on a mantle or shelf.

It would also be a really fun addition to your little man's birthday party.

Please feel free to contact me with any other questions you may have. Thank you!

name: Refuse to Sink Anchor Art
description:
"Refuse to Sink" is such a powerful and inspiring quote to live by.

It is hand lettered and painted around an anchor on a burlap wrapped sign. This wall decor measures 12x12 inches, and comes ready to hang.

It would look great in any number of rooms around your home, but I think it would be especially adorable painted in navy blue and hung in a little boy's room or nursery.

Since the art is hand lettered and painted, there may be slight variations between the sign photographed and the sign you receive. This just means that each sign is truly one of a kind!

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns. Thank you so much for looking!

name: Family Residence Sign
description:
What a perfect housewarming gift!

This burlap sign is hand painted with a large initial, followed by your family's residence. It looks great in an entryway or on a mantle, and fits in nicely with just about any decor.

The sign measures 11x14 inches, and is completely hand painted. No vinyl lettering or stencils are ever used, so each piece truly is one of a kind! Sign comes ready to hang, but also looks great leaning on a shelf.

To order: Purchase this listing and leave a message in the notes to seller section at check out stating what name you'd like before "Residence." I will use the first initial of that name for the large initial, unless instructed otherwise.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Thank you so much for looking, and have a wonderful day!

name: Anchor Art Block
description:
These perfect little anchor art blocks add a delicate touch of nautical design to your home's decor. A small black anchor is painted onto burlap wrapped around a sturdy wood frame with a canvas backing. 

Measuring just 4x4x1.5 inches, these pieces of art fit in just about anywhere. They look just as good hanging on nursery walls as they do sitting pretty on your bookshelves. 

The blocks come ready to hang but can also stand on their own.

name: Burlap Monogram Sign, 16x20
description:
Complete the look of your special day with this personalized burlap wedding decor. Your custom wedding sign features your new monogram hand painted onto burlap stretched across a sturdy 20x16 inch wood frame.

While it looks great on the big day, this burlap personalized sign also makes a great wedding gift or adds a custom feel to your rustic home decor.

Even six years after my wedding, I still love this sign hanging in my bedroom at home. You'll love it too!

When purchasing, please write the initials for your monogram in the notes to seller section at checkout. Traditional wedding monograms include the female's first initial, the couple's last initial, and the male's first initial, in that order. Example: Barack and Michelle Obama's monogram would be MOB. I will paint your initials exactly as you send them to me.

All U.S. orders will be shipped USPS parcel post. Please let me know prior to purchase if you would like to upgrade your shipping and I will create a new listing for you. International orders will be shipped USPS priority.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or custom requests. Thank you!

name: Luck 'o the Irish Burlap Sign
description:
Bring out your green St. Patrick's Day decor this year with this fun burlap sign.

Luck o' the Irish is hand lettered and painted in that oh so lucky color on burlap wrapped around a sturdy 11x14 inch wood frame. St. Patty's Day never looked so good.

Please let me know if you have any questions or special requests- I love custom orders!

name: You Are Loved Valentine's Day Decor
description:
You are loved. Such a simple statement with a powerful punch.

Tell your valentine how you feel this Valentine's Day with an 11x14 inch burlap sign. "You are loved" is hand lettered in red paint on burlap wrapped around a sturdy wooden frame. It is ready to hang, but looks great on a mantle or shelf as well.

Give this sign AS a valentine, or use it in your Valentine's Day decor. Either way, it is sure to bring lots of love.

Feel free to ask if you have any questions or would like any alterations to this sign. I love custom orders!

name: Home Is Wherever We Are Together
description:
Home is wherever we are together- such a sweet sentiment for any family.

This 12 x 12 inch burlap sign can hang as wall art, but it looks just as good sitting pretty on a shelf or fireplace mantle.

The sign measures 12 x 12 inches, and the lettering is hand painted in black on burlap wrapped around a sturdy wood frame.

Interested in different wording? Contact me! I love custom orders.

Thank you so much for looking. Have a wonderful day!

name: Add a Heart to State Art
description:
This listing can be added on to any piece of state art to add a heart to your hometown. Immediately after checkout, email ashley@ramseystreetdesigns.com with where (which city) you'd like the heart.

Both this listing and the State art listing must be in your cart at checkout. Please let me know if you have any questions!

name: Sweet Home State Art- Pick Any State
description: Alabama isn't the only place that can be called "Sweet Home!" Remember your roots with this classically rustic home decor. It will look great hanging on your wall, leaning on a shelf, or sitting pretty up on your mantle. This burlap sign measures 14x11 inches, and features the words, "Sweet Home" above the state of Oklahoma. Each piece is hand painted, so your art will always be one of a kind! Add a red heart to represent your hometown for just $5 more by adding this listing to your cart as well: Add a Heart Please allow 3-5 days before your piece is shipped, as each one is hand painted and made to order.

name: Sing and be Happy Burlap Nursery Art
description:
One of my favorite church songs, Sing and be Happy, is now a burlap sign.

This fun design is perfect for gender neutral nursery decor- it looks great for both boys and girls. Of course, it makes a great piece for us grown ups, too. I think it would be a happy reminder on a gallery wall in your home, or on a shelf or mantle.

You can sing and be happy anywhere!

The sign measures 11x14 inches, and is lettered in brown and gold. The gold in "Sing" has a slight metallic sheen, sure to catch your eye and put a little hop in your step.

The burlap is wrapped around a sturdy wood frame, making it easy to hang as-is.

Looking for different colors or a different saying? Let me know. I love custom orders. And feel free to ask if you have any questions. Thanks so much!

name: Gold Triangle Art on Burlap
description:
This gold triangle art on burlap is a modern twist on traditional burlap art.

It has 4 inch by 3 inch gold triangles lined up symmetrically across a 12 inch by 12 inch burlap sign. The gold paint almost appears more like a gold stain, but with a slight metallic sheen in certain lights. My husband tells me it also creates a bit of an optical illusion- making the unpainted triangles appear to be different colors!

This is about as close to modern/ tribal meets rustic as it gets, and this sign is sure to please anyone!

The art comes wrapped around a wood frame, making it easy to hang, but it looks just as great propped up on a shelf or mantle.

Please feel free to ask if you have any questions!

name: Burlap Antlers Sign
description:
This antler art is a quirky way to bring the outdoors inside. Black deer antlers are hand painted on burlap for unique rustic art that will bring some fun to any wall in your house.

With hand painting comes slight variations in each piece, so you know that your wall art will be one of a kind! This piece measures 14x11 inches and comes ready to hang, but looks great leaning on a shelf or mantle as well.

name: You Are My Sunshine Burlap Sign
description:
You Are My Sunshine is one of the songs I best remember my mama singing to us when we were little, and I now sing it to my own little one.

This burlap sign is a lovely piece of nursery decor that reminds me of those sweet moments every time I see it. It measures 11x14 inches, and is completely hand painted. Each piece varies slightly and truly is one of a kind!

This is the kind of art that can travel seamlessly from the nursery to the big kid room. "You are my sunshine" is painted in brown and a cheerful yellow paint to fit neutrally in any girl's nursery or boy's nursery. It comes ready to hang, but looks great leaning on a shelf as well.

name: Burlap Welcome Sign
description:
This entryway sign is the perfect way to welcome guests into your home.

The burlap gives a rustic chic feel to a classic greeting that will look great in any home. The sign measures 24x12 inches and comes ready to hang but looks just as great leaning on a mantle or shelf.

Each sign is hand painted, and slight variances add to the charm this piece has to offer.

name: Family Burlap Sign- Pick Your Number
description:
Celebrate your family with this original burlap art piece.

This sign is hand painted in black on traditional burlap, for a classy yet rustic feel, and is customized to fit the exact number of members in your family!

There may be slight variations in each piece, as they are all hand painted, adding to the charm these pieces have to offer.

Your sign will come ready to hang, but it looks great leaning on a shelf or mantle as well. Simply select the number you would like painted from the drop down box at check out.
